<title>Letter To You | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Letter To You" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Bruce Springsteen’s new studio album with the E Street Band, Letter To You, was released by Columbia Records on October 23. A rock album fueled by the band's heart-stopping, house-rocking signature sound, the 12 track Letter To You is Springsteen's 20th studio album, and was recorded at his home studio in New Jersey." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/letter-to-you/" />

A rock album fueled by the band's heart-stopping, house-rocking signature sound, the 12 track Letter To You is Springsteen's 20th studio album, and was recorded at his home studio in New Jersey." />

yoast_head_json.title: Letter To You | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.og_description: Bruce Springsteen’s new studio album with the E Street Band, Letter To You, was released by Columbia Records on October 23. A rock album fueled by the band's heart-stopping, house-rocking signature sound, the 12 track Letter To You is Springsteen's 20th studio album, and was recorded at his home studio in New Jersey.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Bruce Springsteen’s new studio album with the E Street Band, Letter To You, was released by Columbia Records on October 23. A rock album fueled by the band's heart-stopping, house-rocking signature sound, the 12 track Letter To You is Springsteen's 20th studio album, and was recorded at his home studio in New Jersey.
